articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Military Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Military Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army headed by Lieut. General Zhang Youxia, commander of the area, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					 Zhang said that he was pleased to visit the DPRK this significant year marking the 60th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.
					
					 He stressed that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the armies and peoples of the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung together with Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai have grown stronger.
					
					 He referred to the fact that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il visited China again and put the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries onto a new higher phase.
					
					 Saying that the army and people of the DPRK have registered great successes in their efforts to improve the standard of people's living and increase the defence capacity in the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, he hoped that the Korean people would significantly greet the conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and make fresh progress in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Meetings of Delegates of WPK Held
articles.content:
Meetings of Delegates of WPK Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Meetings of delegates of North and South Hwanghae provinces and Nampho City of the Workers' Party of Korea for the election of delegates to the WPK conference took place, according to Rodong Sinmun Wednesday.
					 Attending the meetings were delegates elected by provincial, city and county party committees and party organizations of units at different levels.
					
					 The meetings discussed the issue of electing delegates to the conference of the WPK. 
					
					Speeches proposing the election of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as delegate to the conference were made at the meetings by Kim Man Sik, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK who is delegate of the party organization of the provincial committee of the WPK, So Won Chol, secretary of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK who is delegate of the party organization of the provincial committee of the WPK, and Kang Yang Mo, chief secretary of the Nampho Municipal Committee of the WPK.
					
					 They said that the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by leading the WPK and revolution to victory for a long period would shine forever in the history of Kim Il Sung's nation, adding that thanks to his leadership the army and people of the DPRK emerged the heroic army and people fully displaying their tremendous might and wisdom before the world.  
					
					 They noted that the army and people of the DPRK see in the experienced and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il the day of the victory in the drive to build a thriving socialist nation, the desire of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They courteously proposed the election of Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK, reflecting the unanimous wishes of all the party members and people of the provinces and the city.
					
					 Speakers at the meetings unanimously supported and approved the proposal.
					
					 Decisions on electing Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK were adopted at the meetings with the unanimous approval.
					
					 The meetings also elected delegates to the conference of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Vietnamese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Vietnamese President
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Nguyen Minh Triet, President of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, on the occasion of its 65th birthday.
					 Kim in the message noted that the people of the DPRK are rejoiced over the achievements gained by the Vietnamese people in the efforts for the country's reunification and socialist construction under the leadership of the Communist Party of Vietnam over the last 65 years and wish friendly Vietnam bigger progress and prosperity.
					
					 He expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily develop along the common road of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Uzbek President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Uzbek President 
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Islam Karimov, President of Uzbekistan, on its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed the conviction that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Slovak President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Slovak President
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Ivan Gasparovic, President of Slovakia, on the occasion of its Constitutional Day.
					 Kim in the message expressed conviction that the traditional cooperative relations between the DPRK and Slovakia would develop in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Vietnamese PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Vietnamese PM
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Nguyen Tan Dung, Prime Minister of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, Wednesday on the occasion of its 65th birthday.
					The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in political, economic, cultural and other fields, wishing the government and Prime Minister of Vietnam great success in their responsible work for the industrialization of the country and improvement of the standard of people's living.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, too, sent a similar message to his Vietnamese counterpart Pham Gia Khiem on the same day.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets to Slovak PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets to Slovak PM 
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Iveta Radicova, Prime Minister of Slovakia, on the occasion of its Constitutional Day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in all fields.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, too, sent a similar message to his Slovak counterpart Mikulas Dzurinda.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Malaysia Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Malaysia Appointed
						
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Jang Yong Chol was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Malaysia, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador 
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, Wednesday hosted a reception at his embassy on the occasions of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Cuba and the 62nd birthday of the DPRK. 
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission who is chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned. 
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said in his speech that the friendly relations between Cuba and the DPRK were provided by Fidel Castro Ruz and President Kim Il Sung, adding that the two countries have supported and cooperated with each other in the joint struggle for defending independence and sovereignty and socialism.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 The close relations of friendship between Cuba and the DPRK are growing stronger with each passing day under the deep concern of Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, and Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He noted that the party, government and people of Cuba would extend invariable support and solidarity to the fraternal party, government and people of the DPRK, hoping that the Korean people would attain all the goals.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop noted in his speech that the two countries have steadily consolidated and developed the friendly bonds in the joint struggle for protecting socialism.
					
					  The Korean people are rejoiced over as their own over many successes achieved by the fraternal Cuban people in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The DPRK will make positive effort to boost the militant friendship and solidarity with Cuba under the deep care of Kim Jong Il and Raul Castro Ruz provided by Kim Il Sung and Fidel Castro Ruz.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Cuba Diplomatic Ties Marked in Cuba
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Cuba Diplomatic Ties Marked in Cuba
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held in Cuba on August 27 to mark the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Attending it were Yadira Garcia Vera, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Cuba and minister of Primary Industry, Gladys Maria Bejerano Portela, vice-president of the Council of State, and others and officials concerned and popular masses.
					
					 Present on invitation were Ambassador Kwon Sung Chol and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Havana and diplomatic envoys of different countries.
					
					 Ricardo Cabrisas, vice-president of the Council of Ministers, in his speech at the meeting extended the warmest salute to Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on behalf of the Cuban government and people on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 He recalled that Cuba and the DPRK have supported and cooperated with each other in the most difficult period.
					
					 The Cuban people are convinced that the army and people of the DPRK, closely rallied around their leader, would foil all moves of outside forces and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country by their own efforts, he noted, and continued:
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the party and government of Cuba to invariably support the Korean people's just cause of reunification. Cuba will as ever maintain its stand of attaching utmost importance to the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK.
					
					 The meeting was followed by a performance of Cuban artistes.

articles.title: Message and Gift from Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
Message and Gift from Brazilian Figure
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings and gift from Emilia Fernandes, member of the House of Representatives of the National Congress of Brazil, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 The message and gift were handed over to the DPRK ambassador to Brazil on August 25.

articles.title: Hamhung Cultural Exhibition Opens to Public
articles.content:
Hamhung Cultural Exhibition Opens to Public
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The Hamhung Cultural Exhibition, a mass entertainment and educational center in the Songun era, was opened to public with due ceremony on Wednesday.
					Officials and working people in South Hamgyong Province built the wonderful exhibition with a total floor space of more than 5,000 square meters at the foot of Mt. Tonghung.
					
					 It can host such diverse functions as the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibitions, photo and fine art exhibitions, as well as sports and amusement games and performing activities. It can also be used for disseminating common sense and knowledge.
					
					 Fully furnished with public service and catering facilities, the exhibition can make contribution to the cultural and emotional life of the people in the province.

articles.title: National Public Scientific and Technological Presentation Opens
articles.content:
National Public Scientific and Technological Presentation Opens
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A national public scientific and technological presentation opened with due ceremony at the Grand People's Study House Wednesday to mark the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned and scientists, technicians, teachers and working people from across the country.
					
					 Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission who doubles as chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea, made an opening address.
					
					 Presentations began at the 22 panels including agricultural production, foodstuffs, daily necessities, stockbreeding, fruit farming, textile, metal, electricity, coal, railways, IT, Nano technology, etc. on the same day.

articles.title: Exhibition of Youth's Scientific and Technological Achievements
articles.content:
Exhibition of Youth's Scientific and Technological Achievements
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of youth's scientific and technological achievements took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition from Aug. 26 to 31 to mark the Youth Day.
					On display there were more than 3,000 valuable inventions and products manufactured through the introduction of new technologies.
					
					 Drawing the attention of the participants were the production command and security monitoring system, e-library, electronic resources general managing system, the system for putting a 10 000 ton press on a CNC basis, and others greatly conducive to putting the national economy on a modern and IT basis and accelerating the technological updating of production processes.
					
					 Also on display there were phased metal working process based on CNC, multi-element simultaneous analysis system and other products developed recently. 
					
					 Its closing ceremony took place on Aug. 31

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Pledge Made on Ryongnam Hill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Pledge Made on Ryongnam Hill
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- On September 1, Juche 49 (1960) General Secretary Kim Jong Il began studying at Kim Il Sung University.
					 That day, he climbed Ryongnam Hill on the campus and recited a poem "Korea, I Will Glorify Thee" reflecting his will to add luster to Korea, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Since then, all his revolutionary activities have been oriented towards a grand goal of demonstrating the dignity and honor of the nation all over the world by turning the country into an invincible one. 
					
					 He, with ceaseless thinking and pursuit and energetic ideological and theoretical activities, newly expounded the position and role of the leader in the revolutionary struggle and proved the originality of the President's revolutionary ideas. He also consolidated the ideological and theoretical foundation of Songun politics by systematizing and enriching the Juche-oriented military ideas, theories and tactics.
					
					 Under his energetic leadership, the unity of the Party has been cemented and the historical cause for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea commenced. And the People's Army has become infinitely faithful to the leader and the Party.
					
					 His determination to keep the pledge he made on Ryongnam Hill with Songun politics was strikingly manifested in the period of the Arduous March, the forced march.
					
					 With a clear understanding of the changed situation and the requirement of the revolution, he has put forward the army as the pivot and main force of revolution and continued the Songun revolutionary leadership, smashing the imperialists' moves to isolate and stifle the country and bringing about tremendous achievements in all fields, including grand monumental edifices built throughout the country.

articles.title: Life Shining with Patriotic Spirit
articles.content:
Life Shining with Patriotic Spirit
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- September 2 is the 55th death anniversary of Kim Po Hyon, an ardent patriot and grandfather of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 He devoted his all to the country and nation with a strong sense of patriotism and hard-working spirit.
					
					 He encouraged his descendants to take part in the revolution and did his best to help them in their activities without the slightest vacillation in the teeth of the Japanese imperialists' suppression.  
					
					 When he heard the news that his son Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary, was arrested again by the Japanese police, he inspirited his grandson Kim Il Sung, who was studying at Changdok School, to carry forward the family's tradition of patriotism and his father's intention.
					
					 His patriotic mind was never changed even after Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his daughter in law and an outstanding leader of the movement for the emancipation of the Korean women, passed away and another son Kim Hyong Gwon was arrested by the enemy during anti-Japanese armed group activities at home and tortured to death in prison.
					
					 When a few renegades of the revolution visited him in his house in Mangyongdae in a bid to influence him with money and get some information on Kim Il Sung, who launched a bloody war against the Japanese imperialists, he categorically rejected their offer.
					
					 After the liberation of the country, he lived a frugal life as a peasant until his closing days though his grandson was the chief executive of the country.

articles.title: US Termed Principal Harasser of Peace
articles.content:
US Termed Principal Harasser of Peace
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The United States is the principal harasser of global peace and stability and the arch criminal sparking off arms race, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a signed commentary.
					 Recalling that the U.S. recently announced it would massively sell F-35 to Israel, the commentary says this is an extremely dangerous act of escalating the arms race in the Mideast and, furthermore, disturbing peace and stability in the region.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in massively shipping latest military equipment into Israel despite the deteriorating situation in the Mideast is to use Israel as a shock brigade and carry out its strategy to dominate the region with ease, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is a trite method of the U.S. to establish the sphere of its domination over the region by fostering confrontation and dispute among countries and interfering in them and, furthermore, establish domination over the world. 
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the U.S. staged large-scale joint military exercises in the Asia-Pacific region one after another together with its satellite forces recently in an effort to establish domination over the region. In order to establish the sphere of domination over the world the U.S. worked out a new joint war scenario for coordinated operations of naval and air forces and is spending a stupendous amount of money for the modernization of military equipment including the development of unmanned submarines.
					
					 The U.S. arms sale to other countries and its moves for a war of aggression are further escalating arms race worldwide, gravely threatening the global peace and stability.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once such hypocritical acts as putting spurs to the global arms race and harassing peace while paying lip-service to "peace" and "disarmament."

articles.title: People of DPRK Called upon to Make Redoubled Efforts
articles.content:
People of DPRK Called upon to Make Redoubled Efforts
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a jointly signed article calls upon all the people to make redoubled efforts, planting their feet on the ground and looking at the world.
					 It says:
					
					 Planting one's feet on the ground and looking at the world means doing anything by oneself in one's right senses, learning everything worth learning and introducing whatever beneficial to suit one's actual conditions and bringing everything to the level of the world's latest science and technology. 
					
					 The slogan of the Workers' Party of Korea "Plant Your Feet on the Ground and Look at the World!" serves as a revolutionary and militant banner clearly indicating the shortcut to reaching faster the eminence of a thriving socialist nation in conformity with the trend of the times and requirements of the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 This slogan reflects the revolutionary philosophy based on the Juche idea, the national self-esteem which calls for building a rich and powerful nation by one's own efforts with indigenous technology and locally available resources and the spirit of making uninterrupted revolution to bring earlier brighter future with great hope and ideal. It also reflects strong fighting spirit and pluck to attain a goal with one step while others make a thousand steps to do so and stand high on the world. 
					
					 It is the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to build a thriving socialist nation as early as possible, regarding the above-said slogan as an invincible treasured sword. 
					
					 The Korean people could take a firm hold on the eminence of CNC by their own efforts and with their own technology by planting their feet on the ground even under the situation where everything was in short supply and work such miracles as mass-producing Juche iron, Juche fiber and Juche fertilizers. Many spectacular sceneries of Songun unfolded in the country whose appearance is changing beyond recognition with each passing day and monumental structures such as modern factories and enterprises have been brought about by the WPK and the Korean people, guided by the Juche idea, with their own efforts and technology. 
					
					 They have potential strong enough to proudly advance into the world. 
					
					 No matter what and where he or she does, everybody should have the will to render patriotic devotion to serve as a strong root of a thriving nation and make every minute and second worthwhile in the efforts to perform feats.

articles.title: Strengthened Non-Aligned Movement Called for
articles.content:
Strengthened Non-Aligned Movement Called for
						
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) constitutes the main driving force for building a new independent world and the most powerful independent force against imperialism in the present era, and it is necessary to steadily expand and develop the NAM whose truth and might have been proved through revolutionary practices.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 The NAM should continue to advance holding high the banner of independence and peace against imperialism and war, the article says, and goes on: 
					
					 Only through the intensified struggle for peace against imperialism can the non-aligned and developing countries consolidate their national independence, achieve their independent development and progress and realize the noble idea and purpose of the NAM. 
					
					 The non-aligned countries should collectively reject the application of double standards by the imperialist powers and their policy of discrimination. 
					
					 They should firmly unite and solidarize in the field of politics on the principle of independence. 
					
					 It is an important way for consolidating unity and solidarity of the NAM and settling difficult and complicated issues arising in building new society for the non-aligned countries to closely cooperate with each other in economic and technological fields. To expand and develop South-South cooperation based on the principle of collective self-reliance is the only way for ensuring the independent development and socio-economic progress, free from the imperialists' economic pressure, exploitation and plunder. 
					
					 As a dignified member of the NAM, the DPRK will fulfill its responsibility and role to firmly defend the fundamental principle of the NAM and its idea and purity and steadily strengthen and develop it, the article concludes.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Accused of Defending Japan's Crimes in S. Korea
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Accused of Defending Japan's Crimes in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- An international symposium on the lapse of a century since the forced annexation of Korea to Japan was held in south Korea on August 28 under the sponsorship of the "south Korea-Japan Committee for Joint Actions on the Lapse of the Century since the Forced Annexation of Korea to Japan". 
					 Speakers at the symposium said that it is under the patronage of the U.S. that Japan has not yet made any apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 The division of Korea, Japan's moves to revive militarism, the reign of pro-Japanese forces in south Korea and all other facts are directly linked with the U.S., they pointed out, and went on:
					
					 Japan's refusal to settle its past crimes is entirely attributable to the U.S. and the south Korean authorities keen on flunkeyism towards Japan. 
					
					 Declaring that they would lay bare the damage and pain the Japanese imperialists imposed upon the Korean people through diverse activities such as writing textbooks, mass education and legal actions, they called on civic and public organizations to solidarize with each other in the struggle to force Japan to make apology and reparation for its crimes.

articles.title: Japan's Settlement of Its Past Crimes Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Settlement of Its Past Crimes Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The "south Korea-Japan Committee for Joint Actions on the Lapse of the Century since the Forced Annexation of Korea to Japan" grouping at least 140 civic organizations in south Korea and Japan released a "joint declaration of south Korean and Japanese citizens for demanding the settlement of the crimes committed during the colonial rule and achieving peace" in Seoul on August 29.
					 The declaration held that the brigandish "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" was illegal and invalid in the light of international law.
					
					 Due to the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists and its consequences Korea was divided into the south and the north, the declaration said, accusing Japan of refusing still to make apology and reparation for all this.
					
					 It demanded that the Japanese government probe the truth about the forcible drafting, forced labor and conscription of Koreans, etc. and make apology and reparation for all crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 It also urged Japan to stop tampering with history and its moves to grab Tok Islets.
					
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification stressed in a statement on the same day that the Korean nation would never tolerate the aggression committed by Japan but surely force it to make apology and reparation for such crime.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Make Apology and Reparation to Korean People
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Make Apology and Reparation to Korean People
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany issued a statement on August 24 on the lapse of a century since Japan fabricated the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" by force of arms and annexed Korea to it in a brigandish manner.
					 The unheard-of crimes the Japanese imperialists committed during their colonial rule over Korea such as the policy of extermination of the Korean nation, plunder of natural resources and the sexual slavery amounted to Japan's violation of international law, the statement said.
					
					 Referring to the secret test of germ weapons that was recently disclosed to have been conducted by the Japanese imperialists in Pusan during the Second World War, the statement condemned Japan for inflicting unspeakable pain and misfortune upon the Korean people during its colonial rule and in the subsequent period.
					
					 It noted that Japan has not yet made reparation for its blood-stained past crimes but recently made apology only to south Korea, adding this is prompted by its crafty political intention to support traitor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					 It strongly demanded that Japan make sincere apology and reparation to the Korean people.

articles.title: War Moves of US and S. Korean Puppet Group under Fire
articles.content:
War Moves of US and S. Korean Puppet Group under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Akrak Aktar Hamidi, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, and 14 other political and social figures of Pakistan released a joint statement on August 22 denouncing the joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group.
					 The statement charged that the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises posed a threat to peace of the region, contending that the reality clearly shows it is none other than the U.S. which is openly stepping up the preparations for a war while pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 Vehemently denouncing all kinds of joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities, the statement demanded an immediate halt to them.
					
					 It called on all peace-loving people and democratic forces in the world to express solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people and urge the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the war threat.

articles.title: DPRK Important Day Observed in Austria
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed in Austria
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria, issued a bulletin on August 24 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The bulletin carried a photo of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 It said in an article that the President founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army on April 25, 1932 and waged an arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to achieve the liberation of Korea. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The field guidance provided by Kim Jong Il to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960 demonstrated his firm will to complete with arms the Korean revolution which was started and advanced with arms.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics the DPRK has turned into an impregnable fortress and the Korean people successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 by their own efforts, weathering all economic difficulties. 
					
					 The KPA led by Kim Jong Il serves as a pillar and main force for accomplishing the cause of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Praised
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting and an opening ceremony of a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition took place in Russia and India, film shows and photo exhibitions in Mongolia and Myanmar and a national seminar of Juche idea study organizations in Uganda between August 20 and 25 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed in their venues were books and photos on the immortal revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, publications introducing the true picture of Songun Korea and handiworks associated with the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films such as "Reply of Korea," "Army of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation."
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Songun is a traditional political mode of socialist Korea, referring to the fact that Kim Il Sung founded the army before anything else and liberated the country by conducting the anti-Japanese war and then achieved the cause of party and state building. He added that Kim Jong Il has defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and reliably defended peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia with his Songun leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India stressed that the Korean people could advance under the uplifted banner of socialism without any vacillation thanks to the powerful military capacity provided by the Songun politics.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- One day in September Juche 88 (1999) General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to a co-op farm in Jagang Province.
					He looked at the cabbage garden and expressed great satisfaction over the garden taking on a new look, saying that potatoes had been raised there when he had visited the farm in June.
					
					 After being briefed on the weight of a cabbage and the yield per hectare by the chairperson of the farm's management board, he appreciated the farm for producing vegetables as third crops though it was in a highland.
					
					 He said that vegetables had been transported to the province by train before, but now the demand of the province for vegetables was satisfied by itself.
					
					 He then praised the people of the province for creating new things, not complaining about difficult conditions, noting that it was of great significance that three crops for a year were raised in the province, the northern highland.
					
					 Before leaving the farm he encouraged its officials to do a good job in three-crops farming and promised to send high-yielding seeds to the farm.

articles.title: Continuan reuniones de delegados del PTC
articles.content:
Continuan reuniones de delegados del PTC
 Pyongyang, 1 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar las reuniones de los delegados del partido de las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte y del Sur y la ciudad de Nampho para elegir a los delegados a la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, reporto hoy el diario Rodong Sinmun.
					 En las ocasiones participaron los delegados elegidos en los comites provinciales, urbanos y distritales del PTC y las organizaciones partidistas a todos los niveles.
					
					 Ellos debatieron el problema de elegir a los delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					 Los discursos de propuesta estuvieron a cargo del secretario del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, Kim Man Sik, quien es delegado de la organizacion partidista dentro del mismo comite provincial, el secretario del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, So Won Chol, quien es delegado de la organizacion partidista dentro del mismo comite provincial, y el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Nampho, Kang Yang Mo, respectivamente. 
					
					 Los oradores senalaron que seran eternos los meritos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien al conducir el PTC y la revolucion a la victoria durante largo tiempo, realizo imborrables proezas a ser transmitidas generacion tras generacion en la historia de la nacion de Kim Il Sung, y afirmaron que por ser guiados por el, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea pudieron crecer como los heroicos que manifiestan sin reservas a todo el mundo su inagotable poderio e inteligencia. 
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos ven en la probada y diestra orientacion del Dirigente el dia del triunfo de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista donde se realizaran plenamente los ideales del Presidente, apuntaron.
					
					 Propusieron cortesmente elegir al Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC, reflejando el unanime deseo de todos los militantes del partido y los habitantes de las respectivas localidades. 
					
					 Los oradores apoyaron y aprobaron totalmente esta propuesta.
					
					 Seguidamente, quedaron aprobadas por unanimidad las resoluciones de elegir al Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					 Luego, fueron electos otros delegados.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje y presente de personalidad brasilena
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje y presente de personalidad brasilena 
 Pyongyang, 1 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio mensaje de felicitacion y presente que con motivo del 50o aniversario del inicio de su guia sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, le dedicara la miembro de la camara de diputados de la Republica Federativa del Brasil, Emilia Fernandez. 
					 El mensaje y el regalo fueron entregados el 25 de agosto al embajador coreano en ese pais sudamericano.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el acto central por efemeride significativa
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el acto central por efemeride significativa
 Pyongyang, 1 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 50o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la Universidad         Kim Il Sung.
					 Participaron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok y otros cuadros, los funcionarios de ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y organismos de formacion de cuadros del partido, los profesores, empleados, estudiantes y graduados de ese plantel docente asi como los funcionarios de la rama docente de la capital.
					
					 El rector general de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior, Song Ja Rip, senalo en el informe que el primero de septiembre del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente dio su primer paso de direccion en la Universidad Kim Il Sung con el gran proposito de glorificar a Corea, lo cual fue un evento trascendental para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					 Recordo que el Dirigente desplego energicas actividades revolucionarias desde aquel dia en que subio a la cima de la colina Ryongnam con el gran proposito de llevar delante de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung, o sea, la del Juche, y tomo ahi el juramento historico de glorificar a Corea. 
					
					 Durante su carrera de revolucionario en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente profundizo y desarrollo mas la idea Juche, la del Songun, del Presidente, desplegando energicas actividades ideo-teoricas y materializandolas de modo revolucionario, destaco.
					
					 Al prestar profunda atencion a la labor docente y a la investigacion cientifica de la Universidad, el Dirigente se esforzo mucho por desarrollarla como base central y poderosa de la formacion de los continuadores de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y del desarrollo de la ciencia y tecnica del pais, subrayo.
					
					 Hoy dia, la Universidad brilla junto con las historias revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y forma un gran contingente de cuadros nacionales que desempenan el papel medular en la labor docente y cientifica y en la politica, la economia, la cultura y otras varias ramas, apunto.
					
					 Por ultimo, destaco la necesidad de llevar al nivel mundial la labor docente y cientifica y formar mucho mas a las competentes personas revolucionarias que puedan contribuir mucho a la construccion de la gran potencia prospera y al cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Inaugurada exhibicion nacional de ciencia y tecnologia por 10 de octubre
articles.content:
Inaugurada exhibicion nacional de ciencia y tecnologia por 10 de octubre
						
Pyongyang, 1 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia primero en el capitalino Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo la exhibicion nacional de ciencia y tecnologia por el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Asistieron a la ceremonia inaugural los funcionarios correspondientes, los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores y trabajadores de distintas localidades.
					
					La palabra inaugural fue pronunciada por el presidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnologias y del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea, Ri Ja Bang.
					
					El mismo dia, quedo iniciada la presentacion en 22 secciones, entre otras, la agronomia, la industria alimentaria, la de articulos de uso diario, la ganaderia, la fruticultura, la industria textil, la metalurgia, la industria de energia electrica, la carbonifera, el transporte ferroviario, la IT y la nanotecnologia.

articles.title: EE.UU. es perturbador de la paz, califica Minju Joson
articles.content:
EE.UU. es perturbador de la paz, califica Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 1 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Al referirse al reciente anuncio de Estados Unidos de que venderia a Israel muchos cazas "F-35", el diario Minju Joson apunto este miercoles que esto fomentara la carrera armamentista en el Medio Oriente y perturbara por consiguiente la paz y la estabilidad de esta region.
					Este acto sumamente peligroso comprueba que EE.UU. es el responsable principal de la perturbacion de la paz y la estabilidad del mundo y de la carrera armamentista, afirma el comentarista y continua:
					
					Sin hacer caso del empeoramiento de la situacion del Medio Oriente, EE.UU. trata de exportar muchos equipos militares sofisticados a Israel con el proposito de usarlo como brigada de choque que le facilitaria realizar su estrategia de dominar la region.
					
					Es un metodo rutinario de EE.UU. concitar primero la confrontacion y conflictos entre los paises e intervenir en ellos para tomar el dominio de la region y la hegemonia mundial despues.
					
					En este contexto, desarrolla sucesivamente con sus satelites en el Asia-Pacifico los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura. Ademas, elabora el nuevo plan de guerra conjunta, que supone la integracion de las fuerzas navales y aereas, y asigna fabulosos fondos en el desarrollo y la modernizacion de medios militares como el submarino no tripulado.
					
					Debido a la venta de armas y maniobras belicistas de EE.UU., la carrera armamentista se fomenta cada vez mas a escala mundial y la paz y la estabilidad del mundo se ven gravemente amenazadas.
					
					EE.UU. debe parar sus actos aventureros en lugar de hablar hipocritamente de la "paz" y el "desarme".
